column4: hey guys, NTFS writing is relatively stable now right? So say I have an incomplete torrent download on my windows partition, can I run the same torrent and have it continue the download from within windows? I know I could do this, but do you guys think it'll be reliable?
i assume so ,.,. not sure though
that's what I've been thinking, wondering if it'll be fine though
it wouldnt hurt to try,.,. let me no how it goes
